name: @lgcyaxi/oh-my-claude
description: Multi-agent orchestration plugin for Claude Code with multi-provider support

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node --splitting
scripts.build:hooks: bun build src/hooks/comment-checker.ts src/hooks/todo-continuation.ts src/hooks/task-notification.ts src/hooks/task-tracker.ts --outdir dist/hooks --target node
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:mcp && bun run build:hooks && bun run build:statusline
scripts.install-local: bun run build:all && bun run src/cli.ts install
